questions_and_answers.question: When interviewed, who said they costed everyone a world series ring?
Which player had back-to-back complete games?
Which player had an all-time performance in the NL Championship Series game 4?
After being left out of the lineup for the AL Wild Card opener, how did Yankees star Jazz Chisholm Jr. reportedly blow off steam before his heroics in Game 2?
questions_and_answers.answer: He played MLB The Show and mercy-ruled his opponent.

questions_and_answers.question: What Yankees franchise record did rookie Cam Schlittler set during the first inning of his postseason debut against Boston?
questions_and_answers.answer: He threw six pitches at 100 mph or faster in the first inning alone—more than all Yankees pitchers had combined to throw in postseason history since pitch tracking began in 2008.

questions_and_answers.question: What two factors made Aaron Judge’s Game 3 home run against the Blue Jays the first pitch of its kind ever homered off of since 2008?
questions_and_answers.answer: The pitch was 99+ mph and located 1.2 feet inside off the center of the plate.

questions_and_answers.question: Who hit the fastest pitch ever recorded for a home run in postseason history, and what was the speed?
questions_and_answers.answer: Jackson Chourio homered off a 101.4 mph fastball from Daniel Palencia in NLDS Game 2.

questions_and_answers.question: How many times was Shohei Ohtani walked in World Series Game 3, and how many were intentional?
questions_and_answers.answer: He was walked five times total, four of them intentionally.

questions_and_answers.question: Who represented Mexico at the World Cup in 2024
